de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.listener

Interface OnClickListener<X extends IClickable>

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface OnClickListener<X extends IClickable>
    Listener that triggers when a player clicks an IClickable menu element
    Copy of method description:
    You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter
    param element - the element that was clicked
    param player - the player that clicked the element
    param button - the index of the mouse button used, one of MouseEvent.NOBUTTON, MouseEvent.BUTTON1, MouseEvent.BUTTON2 or MouseEvent.BUTTON3
    param sift - true if shift was held during this click. will always be false for MouseEvent.BUTTON3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(X element, org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player, int button, boolean shift)
      You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(X element,
             org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
             int button,
             boolean shift)
        You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter
        Parameters:
        element - the element that was clicked
        player - the player that clicked the element
        button - the index of the mouse button used, one of MouseEvent.NOBUTTON, MouseEvent.BUTTON1, MouseEvent.BUTTON2 or MouseEvent.BUTTON3
        shift - true if shift was held during this click. will always be false for MouseEvent.BUTTON3
